value.name: Shooter identified by law enforcement officials as James T. Hodgkinson
value.description: The shooter at the GOP congressional baseball practice this morning is James T. Hodgkinson of Belleville, Ill., according to law enforcement officials. Hodgkinson, 66, owns a home inspection ...

value.name: Lawmakers worry the toxic atmosphere on Capitol Hill will follow them home, raising safety concerns
value.description: The tenor of the debate on Capitol Hill has been highly personal, with Democrats expressing a sense of distrust toward their Republican colleagues with regard to their personal safety and health, while many GOP members accuse Democrats of using the tragedies of the attack and the pandemic to score political points.

value.name: Gunman dead after shooting top Republican politician
value.description: He has been identified as James T Hodgkinson. Video: Reuters Mr Scalise was shot at a congressional baseball practice just outside of Washington. Officials said several other people were also wounded.
